text: Video demonstrating new relevance system for legal expert systems based on Blawx encodings. The user experience is not that remarkable (it knows what not to ask). What's unique is the technique being used (hypothetical reasoning in goal-directed answer set programming). <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tIk0I2AyORU>
